definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
(bird species of China) Nepal wren-babbler (Pnoepyga immaculata)

sentences.english: All non-Nepalese students enrolled at any of Hong Kong's universities are eligible to participate in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 所有非尼泊尔裔香港注册大学学生均可参加。

sentences.english: A three-year-old girl is now a new living goddess in Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 一名三岁女孩，现在是一个新的活女神在尼泊尔。

sentences.english: There's no reason Nepal should be a puppet.
sentences.chinese: 没道理尼泊尔应该做傀儡。

sentences.english: It's one of the woodcarvings sent from Nepal by my bother.
sentences.chinese: 弟从尼泊尔寄回来的其中一个木雕。

sentences.english: Brenda Lee, a staff member of Oxfam Hong Kong, recently visited Nepal on a documentation trip.
sentences.chinese: 李冰心为乐施会职员，最近探访尼泊尔以作文件纪录。

sentences.english: Maoist chief Prachanda was elected by a majority of the governing assembly over his only rival from the Nepali Congress Party.
sentences.chinese: 毛派主席普拉昌达以巨大优势战胜尼泊尔国会党对手。

sentences.english: Lastyear, a Nepalese man bit a cobra after it bit him first.
sentences.chinese: 去年，一名尼泊尔人在被眼镜蛇咬后反把这条蛇咬死。

sentences.english: This growth came mostly from India and Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 这些学生主要是来自印度和尼泊尔。

sentences.english: Farmers in India and Nepal use low-cost drip irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 印度和尼泊尔的农民使用低成本的滴灌技术。

sentences.english: Hi, my friends in XS , I've been in Nepal for two weeks now.
sentences.chinese: 在行色的各位好，我在尼泊尔呆了两周了。

sentences.english: I see India from Lumbini Nepal to Sonauli India, thank you!
sentences.chinese: 我想从尼泊尔加德满都陆路去印度新德里，有班车吗？

sentences.english: They were released after SSB officials raised the issue with Nepal's Armed Police Force.
sentences.chinese: 印方官员在向尼泊尔武装部队交涉后他们得以获释。

sentences.english: Prachanda also revealed that Nepal would establish special economic zones learning from China's successful experience.
sentences.chinese: 普拉昌达还说，尼泊尔会像中国一样建立经济特区。

sentences.english: A health worker immunizes an infant in Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 医疗工作者在尼泊尔为婴儿注射预防针。

sentences.english: China will always be Nepal's trustworthy neighbor and friend.
sentences.chinese: 中国将永远是尼泊尔可信赖的邻居和朋友。

sentences.english: It's clear that the royal army's weapons are not under the government's control.
sentences.chinese: 要清楚，尼泊尔王军的武器并不受政府的控制。

definition: Tibet/Xizang or Tibetan autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
Ladakh, the eastern part of Jammu and Kashmir in northwest India, adjacent to Kashmir and Tibet, know as "Little Tibet"
Dharamsala in Himachal Pradesh, north India, home of Tibetan government in exile
